A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The humor was Space Balls level (which was a great show by itself) but doesn't belong here. If you like Jar Jar level humor\, and often\, then sure. I loved TFA and the originals. They missed so many opportunities and threw them away at every turn for a terrible and cheap laugh they just forgot the seriousness or anything. Also Canto Bight\, Rose\, Phasma\, and Fin are useless in this movie and everything they do is proven irrelevant and a waste of time in the film. Cut out their part and literally nothing changes. Well\, except maybe the last shot of the film which was pretty ok. It will definitely stop below episode 3 on my rankings. If not for John Williams this would drop below Epsiode 2.
